lines.text: [a woman sees a monkey, but notices a sign that says "Do Not Feed the Monkeys," and looks both ways to make sure nobody's looking; she takes out a bag of peanuts to give to the monkey, but the monkey throws it at her face]
An interesting bird is the South African talking parrot,
Polly want a cracker?, I said Polly want a cracker?
Naw, give me a cold beer!
